name: Export SVG to URI
description:
Export and convert SVG to URI directly to Figma!

When multiple elements are selected, a sprite is created - perfect for icons!


Premium mode

– Unlimited number of elements in a sprite (by default no more than 10).

– The «Layout» parameter is available (allows you to select the distribution of elements in the sprite).

– The «Use symbols» option is available (when exporting the same icons, it can significantly reduce the size of the svg).


Example of using a plugin to create a css sprite.

SVG is compressed using SVGO.
